ygData.subject: Re: Grimrot *spoiler*
ygData.msgSnippet: I was surprised to see my harm touch work while I was fleeing for my life.  I wasn t even facing the mob, just running for the zone and noticed that my harm
ygData.messageBody:
I was surprised to see my harm touch work while I was fleeing for my
life. I wasn't even facing the mob, just running for the zone and
noticed that my harm touch was back. So, I hit it and was amazed to
see it go off for full damage. Go figure....

--- Chip Paul <cpaul@...> wrote:
> From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>
>
> andreas.mangs@... wrote:
> >
> > From: andreas.mangs@...
> >
> > NPC shadowknights can not only harm touch several
> times a fight, they can do
> > it from a distance too.
> >
>
>
> Have you ever tried the max range on harm touch?
> It's always been
> too precious for me to test. We may be able to do
> this as well.
> I still want to HT like Drelzna though =)
>
> Xilith
